name: Phantom Shock
description:
PHANTOM SHOCK

A fast-paced top down shooter for the Nintendo Gameboy!

In this game you will play as experimental super solider known as PHANTOM. Callisto base has been hit hard by an alien invasion. Find and unlock new weapons and fight back the invasion! 

Play the demo today!!!

Download the .gb ROM file below OR play right now in the web browser above!

(Playing on original hardware will give you the best experience!)

  Controls: 

Move(d-pad): WASD

A button(lock direction/strafe): L

B button (shoot): K

  Credits:

Created by:

Kevin Neilson

 Art by:

harveydentmd

 Sound Effects by:

Coffee 'Valley' Bat

 Music, "Phantom Shock" written by:

Virginia Aveline

  Afterword:

This is 1 of 4 games I built for my friends this year for Christmas! 

PHANTOM SHOCK was built for my friend Christian. 

He loves Halo games! Thanks Christian for giving me the inspiration to not only build, but finish a game this year!!!

I will be working more on this game in the future so please stay tuned!
